item.title: Land 9 - Aztec Homeland (Final Land) | Black & White 2
item.description: I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! If you want to play this game, make sure to install the latest Fan Patch (can be found here: https://forum.bwgame.net/threads/running-black-white-2-on-windows-10.7917/) Click here to this post on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X3WZ9OI5_uU

item.title: Land 5 - Nemesis' Banishment (Final Land) | Black & White
item.description: If this video makes your hands itch to play Black & White 1 as again as well, make sure to install the patches v1.1, v1.2 and most important the Fan Patch v 1.41! The Fan Patch fixes a lot of issue on modern computers and makes the game look way better! Find the install guide and all patches here: https://www.bwfiles.com/forum/index.php?topic=7916.0 I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!
